topic.title: Do we really need all those kike scum in here?
topic.body: Oy vej ! The jews are here !

1_1LP5G2PJAXqmcvKeVF8Z3v73G6ezmwFUQ2.body: while ure at it, faggot, try catch me too, motherfucker!

1_16BrmsEhUX3iiU6AcKG4f1AygJJmkitnem.body:
Don't get me wrong - I just think kikes should run their own kike-net from the Auschwitz-server.

They should get the fuck outta here, or we will help them out like in the good old days...

4_1EbkgVAJKgrTeYAmF3FSEJ8dRabpWH87it.body: sure, get jew-herpes and die! lol
